subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The United States Olympic Committee paid another $163,000 to Stephanie Streeter in 2010 even though she had effectively stepped down as its chief executive in October 2009, newly filed tax reports show.
snippet: The United States Olympic Committee paid another $163,000 to Stephanie Streeter in 2010 even though she had effectively stepped down as its chief executive in October 2009, newly filed tax reports show.
